DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Pathological gambling ( PG ) prevalent disorder approve pharmacological treatment . Previous report suggest topiramate could useful reduce impulsivity PG , crave addiction . The goal study investigate effectiveness topiramate combine brief cognitive restructuring treat PG . Methods : 38 PG patient randomize either topiramate ( N=18 ) placebo ( N=20 ) 12-week double-blind trial ; patient receive brief cognitive restructuring . The main outcome measure crave , gamble behaviour , gamble cognitive distortion , impulsivity , depression social adjustment .
